OrgName.entry: PONDS FORGE INTERNATIONAL SPORTS CENTRE SWIMMING POOL

Desc.entry: Leisure swimming - Surf City sessions include: ducklings, aquaerobics, shallow water lane swimming, flumes, baby pool, lazy river ride and wave pool. Lane swimming - international pool sessions include: aquaerobics, swimming lessons (adult and children), swim fit, sub aqua, swimming squads, waterpolo, lifesaving, diving and Age Concern lane swimming (25 and 50 metre). Holds regional, national and international aquatic events. Caf√© and licensed bar.

DisabledAccess.entry: Lift, Changing Rooms, Changing Places toilet/changing Room

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 12noon-7pm, Fri 12noon-7.30pm, Sat & Sun 10.30am-5.15pm (leisure pool); Mon-Thurs 6.30am-10pm, Fri 7.30am-9.30pm, Sat & Sun 8am-9.30pm (competition pool)
